entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then snow beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
